item.title: 24 Mar 2018 20:14
item.description:
Noticed throbbing in Adam's apple since around 02:00pm today. Slight pain - Internal. Deep breaths increase the throbbing pain

Food just before issue - Couple almond Chocolates from TJs. Coffee from Source of Nile restaurant.

Vitals in Samsung phone. ðŸ”—
